docs.text:
Students API


Authentication method


To authenticate a 
X-AUTH-TOKEN
 header must be passed


Fetch all students


method: GET
endpoint: /students




Fetch specific student


method: GET
endpoint: /student/id




Example response


[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "firstName": "Student",
        "lastName": "Example",
        "phone": "00 1111 2222",
        "email": "student@email.com"
    },
    {
        "id": 2,
        "firstName": "Student 2",
        "lastName": "Example 2",
        "phone": "00 1111 3223",
        "email": "student2@email.com"
    }
]
docs.title: Students

docs.text: To authenticate a  X-AUTH-TOKEN  header must be passed
docs.title: Authentication method

docs.text:
Students API


Authentication method


To authenticate a 
X-AUTH-TOKEN
 header must be passed


Fetch all teachers


method: GET
endpoint: /teachers




Fetch specific teacher


method: GET
endpoint: /teacher/id




Example response


[
    {
        "id": 6,
        "firstName": "Professor 1",
        "lastName": "Example 1",
        "email": "professor@example.com",
        "room": "123"
    },
    {
        "id": 7,
        "firstName": "Professor 1",
        "lastName": "Example 1",
        "email": "professor@example.com",
        "room": "123"
    }
]
